track.name: Queen Bee
comments: Honest blues from a real authentic........musical Joe.........well musical Taj Mahal............Wonderful............
taj rocks me to my soul :)
hey @garisgood, check out the version of this on the album with Taj Mahal & Toumani Diabate for true malinese blues flavor
hermosa mezcla de ritmos....muy buena
PERFECT!!!
gotta luv the feel of Taj's sounds.
I love it!
TAJ!
Cheery.
Love this guy and this song is a wonderful classic Taj Mahal song -- great voice!

garisgood, not to nitpick put there's a difference between african music and african-american music. sure blues has definite african roots but it originated in america and has its own distinct sound.

and besides, this song sounds more carribian than anything to me.

love the african vibe on this one? you serious? blues, rock, jazz, rap, its pretty much all African in origin unless you are talking about classical. not to distract from the fantastic song, but learn where you and what you enjoy began
played this song at my wedding... :D
I'll never get sick of this song
En un claro del bosque, mecido por la brisa, recordando algo lejano pero aún presente en la memoria.
sencillamente pacifica!
me hace sentir bien
love the african vibe on this track..
so sweet and melodic ~ this song floats like a bee tending it's flowers. must take a man w/ a big heart to make a song speak so clearly...(and i could go on and on)
She rock me to my soul...........awesome.
